226632.name: Divine Sunderer
226632.description:
40 Attack Damage
300 Health
20 Ability Haste


  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional + {{ Item_Melee_Ranged_Split_B }} target max Health physical damage {{ Item_Cooldown }}. If the target is a champion, also heal for 55% of the premitigation damage.

    {{ Item_Mythic_Passive }} 3% Armor Penetration and 3% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade deals min damage to units, but no more than damage to Monsters. {{ Item_Melee_Ranged_Rules }}
